metadata.summary: Deploy and execute custom executables or scripts on endpoints through LimaCharlie agents with structured output collection
metadata.primary_use_case: Run vendor-specific cleanup tools or forensic utilities on endpoints when native LimaCharlie commands are insufficient

extracted_apis.description: Execute a payload on endpoint with optional arguments
Retrieve log file from endpoint when payload generates more than 10MB output
Upload payload binary using signed URL with Content-Type: application/octet-stream
Download payload binary using signed URL

cross_refs.description: Payload Manager extension provides UI and automation for managing payloads
